event.title: The Latination Tour by Dance Design
event.description:
Click to book tickets online: https://goo.gl/mTI4bN
Get ready to groove to the rhythm of the conga and shimmy to the bass as Dance Design brings to you The Latination. Hailing from Kolkata, this quartet are here to play the best of Salsa, Mambo, Cha Cha and Boogaloo for everyone to dance all night long. They have the perfect night for salsa enthusiasts to shake a leg with authentic Latin music from the Carribean Islands.

event.title: HRC Local featuring Kabir Cafe. Opening act by Saby Singh. - Thursday Live!
event.description:
Click to book tickets online: https://goo.gl/ePHb4s
"Local is the new global. The idea of ""Indian"" music has turned on it's head. This new wave of awareness and pride in our roots coupled with global awareness, contact and context that technology has brought in has changed the ""Indian"" sound as we know it. We believe it's been for the better.
4/4 Entertainment in association with Hard Rock Cafe India brings you a brand new series of gigs called #HRCLocal. A celebration of local sounds from around the country .We tour the country with two acts who capture the essence of this country with their songs, stories and language. This month we have the master raconteurs - Neeraj Arya's Kabir Cafe touring 4 cities with their songs and stories on Kabir's way of life. Supported by Saby, a refreshing new talent whose voice and minimalist arrangements are sure to blow you away."
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.

event.title: BOMB Thursday Night featuring Corner Cafe Chronicles, Insignia & Reverie - Thursday Live!
event.description:
Ticket Price: 250 (Entry) + 500 (Cover); 1800 (VIP)
"Hailing from Mumbai, Corner Café Chronicles resounds of energy, spirit, freedom and the pure love for music. We believe that music is not bound by barriers and is powerful enough to rejuvenate a whirlpool of emotions in people that can bring them together. Our music is often a culmination of genres, giving an old school edge with a twist and a feeling of vibrancy. Every song, hence, has its own unique quality and melody that strikes a chord with each listener.
Insignia are a three-piece outfit From Mumbai, India. We like punk rock. It speaks to us. We like hooks, melodies, three minute songs, blazing speed, snap-happy numbers, extreme levels of volume, mellow acoustic tunes, The Beatles, The clash, The Pixies, Nirvana, Husker Du, chilled beer, R.E.M, Fugazi, Chinese food, and swapping our instruments.

event.title: Blakc - Thursday Live!
event.description:
Ticket Price: 250 (Entry) + 500 (Cover); 1800 (VIP)
"This is the story of BLAKC. BLAKC is a band from Mumbai made up of five very unique, talented individuals.
“BLAKC has always been about two things, the music and the people. We believe that our music is an extension of our personalities and the only way to connect to so many music lovers. Off stage we are weird; on stage we can tear a place apart purely because of the energy we have. BLAKC since its beginning has been unable to fit into genres, we stopped trying and stuck to doing what we loved doing more than any other which is making our own music. We each have such various influences that every song has multiple personalities. We love what we do and we love that you like us enough to have read this. Peace.........and let the BLACKATTAINMENT begin.............”
"
